verses.name: John 16:10
verses.text: Of righteousness, because I go to my Father, and ye see me no more;

verses.name: John 16:11
verses.text: Of judgment, because the prince of this world is judged.

verses.name: John 16:12
verses.text: I have yet many things to say unto you, but ye cannot bear them now.

verses.name: John 16:13
verses.text: Howbeit when he, the Spirit of truth, is come, he will guide you into all truth: for he shall not speak of himself; but whatsoever he shall hear, that shall he speak: and he will shew you things to come.

verses.name: John 16:14
verses.text: He shall glorify me: for he shall receive of mine, and shall shew it unto you.
